p: Avoidance is the principal method of deterrence. Searching of accurate treatment for COVID-19 patients has been in progress and wide range of possible treatments is being tested by researchers. Numerous collaborative efforts to discover and evaluate the effectiveness of anti-viral, immune-therapies, monoclonal antibodies, and vaccines have rapidly emerged. These all treatment is symptomatic but oxygen therapy using ventilator plays major role in the treatment of COVID-19. All the recommended treatments for COVID-19 as shown in Fig. 4 .
